articles.title: European markets live updates: stocks, data, news and earnings - CNBC
articles.description: European stock markets plunged as banks fell 7% on an announcement from troubled Credit Suisse.
articles.content:
European stock markets were sharply lower Wednesday, with banking stocks in deep negative territory amid the global Silicon Valley Bank fallout and more bad news for Credit Suisse.
